org.sql: SELECT spree_option_value_variants.* FROM spree_option_value_variants WHERE spree_option_value_variants.variant_id = "$1" AND spree_option_value_variants.option_value_id = "$2"

rewrites.sql: SELECT spree_option_value_variants.* FROM spree_option_value_variants WHERE spree_option_value_variants.variant_id = "$1" AND spree_option_value_variants.option_value_id = "$2" LIMIT 1
